sections.title: Come, Now Is the Time to Worship
sections.author: Brian Doerksen
sections.snippet: Come, now is the time to worship. Come, now is the time to give your heart. Come, just as you are to worship. Come, just as you are before your God. Come.

sections.title: Responsorial Psalm
sections.author: (Psalm 34: 2-3, 17-18, 19, 23)
sections.snippet: The Lord hears the cry of the poor.

sections.author: 2 Corinthians 5:19
sections.snippet: God was reconciling, the world to himself in Christ, and entrusting to us the message of salvation.
sections.title: Gospel Acclamation
I Love the Lord
sections.author: Paul Inwood
sections.snippet: I love the Lord who has heard my cry. I love the Lord, standing at my side. I love the Lord, always close to me. I love the Lord, love the Lord who saves and sets me free.

sections.author: John W. Thompson, Randy Scruggs
sections.snippet: Lord, prepare me to be a sanctuary; pure and holy; tried and true. With thanksgiving; I'll be a living Sanctuary for You.
sections.title: Sanctuary
Have Mercy, Son of David
sections.author: Steve Angrisano/Curtis Stephan/Fr. Harry Hagan OSB
sections.snippet: Have mercy, Son of David! By mercy set us free. Have mercy, Son of David! Have mercy, have mercy.

sections.title: Amazing Grace My Chains Are Gone
sections.author: John Newton, Chris Tomlin, and Louie Giglio
sections.snippet: Amazing grace! How sweet the sound, that saved a wretch like me! I once was lost, but now am found, was blind but now I see.

sections.title: Lord, I lift Your name on high
sections.author: Rick Doyle Founds
sections.snippet: Lord, I lift Your name on high; Lord, I love to sing Your praises; I'm so glad You're in my life; I'm so glad You came to save us.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Lord have mercy! Christ have mercy! Lord have mercy!

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Glory to God! Glory to God in the highest, and on earth, peace to people of goodwill.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the moment of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: When we eat this breadand drink this cup, we proclaim your death, O Lord, until you come again.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Lamb of God, You take away the sins of the world; have mercy, have mercy on us.
